nodes.text: Mocking Trees were a type of tree. When Etro and Droza Edthatt heard Humans speaking in Galactic Basic Standard, they were reminded of Mocking Trees.

Mocking Trees were mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
